places.title: Great Wall of China
places.description: An ancient world wonder stretching across mountains and valleys, reflecting China's rich history.

places.title: Taj Mahal, India
places.description: A magnificent white marble mausoleum built as a symbol of love and one of the Seven Wonders.

places.title: Statue of Liberty, New York
places.description: A global symbol of freedom standing proudly in New York Harbor, welcoming visitors from around the world.

places.title: Santorini, Greece
places.description: Famous for its whitewashed buildings, blue domes, and stunning sunsets over the Aegean Sea.

places.title: Colosseum, Rome
